meanings.definition: A series of sharp turns or changes in direction.
meanings.sent1: The hiker followed the zigs of the mountain trail to reach the summit.
meanings.sent2: The skier navigated the zigs of the slalom course with skill.
meanings.sent3: The maze was full of unexpected zigs that confused the participants.
meanings.sent4: The plot of the movie had so many zigs that it kept the audience guessing.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster's zigs and zags thrilled the riders as they sped down the track.
